name: node-music-discord-rpc
description: Advanced discord music rich presence status with support for album covers

scripts.build: rimraf bundle.cjs && npx esbuild app.js --bundle --outfile=bundle.cjs --format=cjs --platform=node && rimraf ./build/node-music-discord-rpc && npx pkg bundle.cjs --t node18-linux -o ./build/node-music-discord-rpc

author: Patryk Kurdziel
